en.title: FE's Achievers Recognition Dinner, Vietnam, 30th May 2009 (1)
en.content:
FE's Achievers Recognition Dinner in Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam on 30th May 2009 was a GREAT SUCCESS with 600 Members, Leaders, VIPs and Invited Guests. VIPs attending include the wife of Deputy Prime Minister of Vietnam, Madam Ho Cong Con, prominent business ladies Madam Tran Thi Huong, Madam Tran Thi Kim Nhung, Chairman of Thian Nhan Charity Foundation and former Deputy Mayor of Ho Chi Minh City Madam Le Thi Van, Chairman of Ho Chi Minh City Foundation For Poor Rtd General Le Thanh Hai, Fashion TV Vietnam Director Madam Hong Tu Lan, Rtd General Nguyen Van Bien, FE Founder CEO Paul Ting, FE Consultant Master Yap, FE Spokesman Champion Bodybuilder Wong Hong and FE Spokeswoman Miss Vietnam Tourism 2008 Miss Ngoc Diem. The momentum for FE in Vietnam is building up fast, thanks to the efforts put in by dedicated FE Leaders and Country Licensee Doan Nguyen.

Highlights of The Event Include:

- Performances by Children Dance Troupe.

- Opening Introduction by FE Vietnam Spokeswoman Miss Ngoc Diem.

- Welcome Speech by Country Licensee, Doan Nguyen.

- Product Talk by FE Consultant Master Yap. 

- Product Demos by Master Yap and FE Spokesman Wong Hong. As usual the crowd was amazed by the
  demonstrations.

- Product Testimonial by Wong Hong.

- Product Testimonial by Chairman of Ho Chi Minh City Foundation For The Poor, Rtd General Le Thanh Hai
  who shared on how FE's Quantum Pendant has helped him.

- Mock Cheque Presentation by FE Founder CEO Paul Ting to Thien Nhan Charity Foundation.

- Sharing by FE's Founder CEO Paul Ting on FE's culture of social entrepreneurism. 

- Recognition of New Directors.

- Sharing by FE Presidential Directors KC Phoon, Sam Ho and Kenny Yick.

- Lucky Draws. 

FE would like to thank FE's Vietnam Country Licensee Doan Nguyen and his team for organizing the successful event. A BIG THANK YOU also to the many FE PDs and Leaders who supported the event. 

SEE YOU ALL AT THE TOP! AHOO! AHOO! AHOO!!! 
 
< Click Here For More Photos >
